titles: The malcontent. Augmented by Marston. With the additions played by the Kings Maiesties servants. Written by Ihon Webster. 1604
author: Marston, John, 1575?-1634.
Webster, John, 1580?-1625?
publisher: Printed by V[alentine] S[immes] for William Aspley, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard,
notes: The first word of the title is xylographic.
